verses.text: King \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w To|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* people \w of|strong="H1005"\w* every nation \w and|strong="H1005"\w* language who dwell \w in|strong="H1965"\w* all \w the|strong="H5020"\w* earth: May \w your|strong="H5020"\w* prosperity \w be|strong="H1934"\w* multiplied.

I am pleased \w to|strong="H5922"\w* declare \w the|strong="H5922"\w* signs \w and|strong="H1763"\w* wonders \w that|strong="H1763"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Most High God has performed \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w*.

How great \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w His|strong="H4481"\w* signs, how mighty \w His|strong="H4481"\w* wonders! \w His|strong="H4481"\w* kingdom \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w an|strong="H3606"\w* eternal kingdom; \w His|strong="H4481"\w* dominion endures \w from|strong="H4481"\w* generation \w to|strong="H2942"\w* generation. Nebuchadnezzar’s Dream of a Great Tree
I, Nebuchadnezzar, was at ease \w in|strong="H5954"\w* my house \w and|strong="H2493"\w* flourishing \w in|strong="H5954"\w* my palace.

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H2493"\w* \w it|strong="H6925"\w* frightened \w me|strong="H6925"\w*; \w while|strong="H5705"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* bed, \w the|strong="H6925"\w* images \w and|strong="H2493"\w* visions \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w mind|strong="H7308"\w* alarmed \w me|strong="H6925"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* issued \w a|strong="H3068"\w* decree \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men \w of|strong="H1768"\w* Babylon \w be|strong="H3809"\w* brought before me \w to|strong="H3046"\w* interpret \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* me.

When \w the|strong="H5922"\w* magicians, enchanters, astrologers,\f + \fr 4:7 \ft Or Chaldeans\f* \w and|strong="H1934"\w* diviners came \w in|strong="H5922"\w*, I told \w them|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* dream, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* they could not interpret \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3606"\w* at last, into my presence \w came|strong="H4291"\w* Daniel (\w whose|strong="H3606"\w* name \w is|strong="H3606"\w* Belteshazzar after \w the|strong="H3606"\w* name \w of|strong="H5491"\w* my god, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H8631"\w* whom \w is|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H5491"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods). \w And|strong="H8065"\w* I told him \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dream:

“\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Belteshazzar, chief \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* magicians, \w I|strong="H4481"\w* know \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods \w is|strong="H3606"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w you|strong="H4481"\w* \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w no|strong="H3606"\w* mystery baffles \w you|strong="H4481"\w*. \w So|strong="H4481"\w* explain \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w me|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* visions \w I|strong="H4481"\w* saw \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w my|strong="H4481"\w* dream, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* interpretation.

\w In|strong="H5922"\w* \w these|strong="H4481"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* \w mind|strong="H7217"\w* as \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* lying \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*, \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w this|strong="H5922"\w* come \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w pass|strong="H1934"\w*: There \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tree \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* midst \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* land, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w its|strong="H4481"\w* height \w was|strong="H1934"\w* great.

\w The|strong="H4481"\w* tree grew large \w and|strong="H3652"\w* strong; \w its|strong="H7113"\w* top reached \w the|strong="H4481"\w* sky, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w it|strong="H6853"\w* \w was|strong="H2423"\w* visible \w to|strong="H2429"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* ends \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* earth.

Its leaves \w were|strong="H1768"\w* beautiful, its fruit \w was|strong="H2423"\w* abundant, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* upon it \w was|strong="H2423"\w* food \w for|strong="H1768"\w* all. Under it \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w field|strong="H1251"\w* found shelter, \w in|strong="H2508"\w* its branches \w the|strong="H1768"\w* birds \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* air nested, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w from|strong="H1768"\w* it every creature \w was|strong="H2423"\w* fed.

As \w I|strong="H4481"\w* lay \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* bed, \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w also|strong="H4481"\w* saw \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* visions \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* \w mind|strong="H3825"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* watcher,\f + \fr 4:13 \ft Or an angelic watcher or a messenger; also in verses 17 and 23\f* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy one, coming down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* heaven.

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* called \w out|strong="H6966"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* loud voice: ‘Cut down \w the|strong="H5922"\w* tree \w and|strong="H4437"\w* chop off \w its|strong="H3046"\w* branches; strip off \w its|strong="H3046"\w* leaves \w and|strong="H4437"\w* scatter \w its|strong="H3046"\w* fruit. Let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* beasts flee \w from|strong="H1768"\w* under \w it|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* birds \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* branches.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* leave \w the|strong="H3606"\w* stump \w with|strong="H6903"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* roots \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* ground, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* band \w of|strong="H4437"\w* iron \w and|strong="H4430"\w* bronze around it, \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* tender grass \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field. Let him \w be|strong="H3809"\w* drenched \w with|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4437"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H4430"\w* graze \w with|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts on \w the|strong="H3606"\w* grass \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth.

Let \w his|strong="H1768"\w* mind \w be|strong="H8160"\w* changed \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* let him \w be|strong="H8160"\w* given \w the|strong="H1768"\w* mind \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* beast till \w seven|strong="H2298"\w* \w times|strong="H2298"\w* pass him by.

\w This|strong="H3606"\w* decision \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* decree \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* watchers, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* verdict declared by \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy ones, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* living \w will|strong="H1768"\w* know \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High rules over \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H1768"\w* mankind \w and|strong="H8065"\w* gives it \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* wishes, setting over it \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lowliest \w of|strong="H1768"\w* men.’

\w This|strong="H3606"\w* \w is|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dream \w that|strong="H3606"\w* I, King Nebuchadnezzar, saw. Now, Belteshazzar, tell me \w the|strong="H3606"\w* interpretation, \w because|strong="H3606"\w* \w none|strong="H3606"\w* \w of|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men \w of|strong="H3606"\w* my kingdom can interpret \w it|strong="H6853"\w* \w for|strong="H4203"\w* me. \w But|strong="H3606"\w* you are able, \w because|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods \w is|strong="H3606"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* you.” Daniel Interprets the Second Dream

\w For|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* time, Daniel, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w also|strong="H4430"\w* known \w as|strong="H1768"\w* Belteshazzar, \w was|strong="H4430"\w* perplexed, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* thoughts alarmed him. \w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* said, “Belteshazzar, \w do|strong="H8065"\w* not let \w the|strong="H1768"\w* dream \w or|strong="H4430"\w* its interpretation alarm \w you|strong="H1768"\w*.” “\w My|strong="H4430"\w* lord,” replied Belteshazzar, “may \w the|strong="H1768"\w* dream apply \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w those|strong="H1768"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* hate \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* its interpretation \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* enemies!

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* tree \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* grew large \w and|strong="H4430"\w* strong, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* top reached \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w sky|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* visible \w to|strong="H5922"\w* all \w the|strong="H5922"\w* earth,

\w whose|strong="H1768"\w* foliage \w was|strong="H4430"\w* beautiful \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* fruit \w was|strong="H4430"\w* abundant, providing food \w for|strong="H5922"\w* all, under \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* field lived, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* branches \w the|strong="H5922"\w* birds \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* air nested—

\w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* king, \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* tree! \w For|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1934"\w* become great \w and|strong="H4437"\w* strong; \w your|strong="H1768"\w* greatness \w has|strong="H1768"\w* grown \w to|strong="H5922"\w* reach \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w sky|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* dominion extends \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* ends \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H4437"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* king, saw \w a|strong="H3068"\w* watcher, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy one, coming down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* saying: ‘Cut down \w the|strong="H4481"\w* tree \w and|strong="H4437"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H4481"\w*, \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w leave|strong="H7662"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w stump|strong="H6136"\w* with \w its|strong="H3046"\w* \w roots|strong="H8330"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* ground, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* band \w of|strong="H4481"\w* iron \w and|strong="H4437"\w* bronze around \w it|strong="H4481"\w*, \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* tender grass \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* field. Let \w him|strong="H4481"\w* be drenched with \w the|strong="H4481"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* graze with \w the|strong="H4481"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* field till seven times pass \w him|strong="H4481"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w*.’

\w This|strong="H5922"\w* is \w the|strong="H5922"\w* interpretation, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H5922"\w* is \w the|strong="H5922"\w* decree \w that|strong="H2006"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Most High \w has|strong="H4430"\w* issued \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*:

\w You|strong="H5922"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* be driven away from mankind, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w your|strong="H5020"\w* dwelling \w will|strong="H4430"\w* be \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field. \w You|strong="H5922"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* feed \w on|strong="H5922"\w* grass like \w an|strong="H4430"\w* ox \w and|strong="H4430"\w* be drenched \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4430"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* seven times \w shall|strong="H3606"\w* pass \w you|strong="H5922"\w* by, until \w you|strong="H5922"\w* acknowledge \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High rules \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H4430"\w* mankind \w and|strong="H4430"\w* gives \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* whom \w He|strong="H5020"\w* wishes.

\w As|strong="H1768"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* command \w to|strong="H5922"\w* leave \w the|strong="H5922"\w* stump \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* tree \w with|strong="H5922"\w* its roots, \w your|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* restored \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w soon|strong="H1768"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* acknowledge \w that|strong="H1768"\w* Heaven rules.

Therefore, may \w my|strong="H4430"\w* advice \w be|strong="H3809"\w* pleasing \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*. Break away \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* sins by doing \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* right, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* iniquities by showing mercy \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* oppressed. Perhaps \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w an|strong="H4430"\w* extension \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* prosperity.” The Second Dream Fulfilled
All \w this|strong="H4481"\w* happened \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*.

Twelve months later, \w as|strong="H6211"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H2423"\w* walking \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* roof \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w royal|strong="H4437"\w* palace \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon,

\w the|strong="H5922"\w* king exclaimed, “\w Is|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H5922"\w* not Babylon \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Great|strong="H7236"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* myself \w have|strong="H5020"\w* built \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* might \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* power \w as|strong="H6211"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* royal residence \w and|strong="H7236"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* glory \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* majesty?”

While \w the|strong="H5922"\w* words \w were|strong="H1768"\w* still \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* king’s mouth, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w came|strong="H1768"\w* \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*: “\w It|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* decreed \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, King \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* departed \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*.

\w You|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H6634"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* driven away \w from|strong="H1768"\w* mankind \w to|strong="H2429"\w* \w live|strong="H1753"\w* \w with|strong="H5648"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H6634"\w* feed on grass like \w an|strong="H5648"\w* ox. \w And|strong="H8065"\w* seven times \w will|strong="H6634"\w* \w pass|strong="H3809"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* by, until \w you|strong="H1768"\w* acknowledge \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Most|strong="H2429"\w* High rules over \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H1768"\w* mankind \w and|strong="H8065"\w* gives it \w to|strong="H2429"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w wishes|strong="H6634"\w*.”

At \w that|strong="H5922"\w* moment \w the|strong="H5922"\w* sentence \w against|strong="H5922"\w* Nebuchadnezzar \w was|strong="H7238"\w* fulfilled. He \w was|strong="H7238"\w* driven away \w from|strong="H3367"\w* mankind. He ate grass like \w an|strong="H4437"\w* ox, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* body \w was|strong="H7238"\w* drenched \w with|strong="H8421"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4437"\w* heaven, until \w his|strong="H5922"\w* hair grew like \w the|strong="H5922"\w* feathers \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w an|strong="H4437"\w* eagle \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* nails like \w the|strong="H5922"\w* claws \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bird. Nebuchadnezzar Restored

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* at \w the|strong="H3606"\w* end \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w those|strong="H8214"\w* days \w I|strong="H1768"\w*, \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, looked \w up|strong="H7313"\w* \w to|strong="H3202"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w my|strong="H4430"\w* sanity \w was|strong="H4430"\w* restored \w to|strong="H3202"\w* me. \w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w honored|strong="H1922"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w glorified|strong="H1922"\w* Him \w who|strong="H1768"\w* lives forever: “\w For|strong="H1768"\w* \w His|strong="H3606"\w* dominion \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w an|strong="H4430"\w* everlasting dominion, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w His|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom endures \w from|strong="H1768"\w* generation \w to|strong="H3202"\w* generation.

All the peoples of the earth are counted as nothing, and He does as He pleases with the army of heaven and the peoples of the earth. There is no one who can restrain His hand or say to Him, ‘What have You done?’”

At the same time my sanity was restored, my honor and splendor returned to me for the glory of my kingdom. My advisers and nobles sought me out, and I was restored to my throne, and surpassing greatness was added to me.
Now I, Nebuchadnezzar, praise and exalt and glorify the King of heaven, for all His works are true and all His ways are just. And He is able to humble those who walk in pride.
